channel.title: Macromedia Flash
channel.description:
Well Im a (pretty cool) Flash Pro. But, I have no (good) Ideas for my Website. So if you can suggest a (cool) Game or something I can make ill be happy too. Also, ill be happy (kinda) to make you a game or something.
Request (stuff) away!

item.title: Macromedia Flash
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Carazon ™:

Only Multiplayer flash Gma ei saw is Club Penguin… But, Sorry, dont know how, but I can, make a shooting game.

Try Platform Racing and Stick Arena.

item.title: Macromedia Flash
item.dc:creator: @Carazon Carazon ™
item.description:
@Carazon wrote:

xxlegitxx:

Lol. You type (sorta) amazing. I got a (pretty) good idea for a (flash) game. (Like) base it off Pokemon (battles). Maybe (it) will be a (big) hit. Remember (to) include (hp), damage, (poison), paralysis, (sleep), etc. And have (cool) Pokemon(, too). No (shitty) ones like fucking Jigglypuff. It’s a (fucking) balloon with eyes. (Tell) (me) (what) (you) (think) (about) (my) (idea).

Well lol… Ever heard of Pokemon Online?
Its like the GBA Game, just on the computer[quote=“The Un-Named, post:3, topic:133570”]Use ( and ) to make (strong) words point out, like - and -, but don’t do it on every strong word. :[/quote]
Did it on purpose.

Read full topic
